qas.question: When were the first campus police formed at Yale?
Who were the the first campus police composed of?
Why was the campus police established?

answers.text: quell unrest between students and city residents

qas.question: What other safety measures are available at Yale besides campus police?

answers.text: blue phones, a safety escort, and 24-hour shuttle service.

qas.question: When were the last campus police formed at Yale?
When were the first campus police fired at Yale?
Who were the the last campus police composed of?

plausible_answers.text: quell unrest between students and city residents

qas.question: Why was the campus police disbanded?

plausible_answers.text: blue phones, a safety escort, and 24-hour shuttle service

qas.question: What other safety measures are unavailable at Yale besides campus police?

context: Several campus safety strategies have been pioneered at Yale. The first campus police force was founded at Yale in <a0_0><b4_0><b5_0>1894<b5_0/><b4_0/><a0_0/>, when the university contracted <a1_0><b6_0>city police officers<b6_0/><a1_0/> to exclusively cover the campus. Later hired by the university, the officers were originally brought in to <a2_0><b7_0>quell unrest between students and city residents<b7_0/><a2_0/> and curb destructive student behavior. In addition to the Yale Police Department, a variety of safety services are available including <a3_0><b8_0>blue phones, a safety escort, and 24-hour shuttle service<b8_0/>.
